# nirvana_networking_vpc (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "nirvana_networking_vpc" "example_networking_vpc" {
  vpc_id = "vpc_id"
}
```

- `vpc_id` (String)

- `created_at` (String)

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `name` (String)
